problem_names:
lemma resComm:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "<\<nu>a><\<nu>b>P \<approx>\<^sup>s <\<nu>b><\<nu>a>P"

lemma matchId:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: pi

  shows "[a\<frown>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s P"

lemma mismatchNil:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: pi

  shows "[a\<noteq>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s \<zero>"

lemma sumSym:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<approx>\<^sup>s Q \<oplus> P"

lemma sumAssoc:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  shows "(P \<oplus> Q) \<oplus> R \<approx>\<^sup>s P \<oplus> (Q \<oplus> R)"

lemma sumZero:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<oplus> \<zero> \<approx>\<^sup>s P"

lemma parZero:
  fixes P :: pi

  shows "P \<parallel> \<zero> \<approx>\<^sup>s P"

lemma parSym:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<approx>\<^sup>s Q \<parallel> P"

lemma scopeExtPar:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes "x \<sharp> P"

  shows "<\<nu>x>(P \<parallel> Q) \<approx>\<^sup>s P \<parallel> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma scopeExtPar':
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes "x \<sharp> Q"

  shows "<\<nu>x>(P \<parallel> Q) \<approx>\<^sup>s (<\<nu>x>P) \<parallel> Q"

lemma parAssoc:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  shows "(P \<parallel> Q) \<parallel> R \<approx>\<^sup>s P \<parallel> (Q \<parallel> R)"

lemma freshRes:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   a :: name

  assumes "a \<sharp> P"

  shows "<\<nu>a>P \<approx>\<^sup>s P"

lemma scopeExtSum:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name
  
  assumes "x \<sharp> P"

  shows "<\<nu>x>(P \<oplus> Q) \<approx>\<^sup>s P \<oplus> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma bangSC:
  fixes P

  shows "!P \<approx>\<^sup>s P \<parallel> !P"
translations:
lemma resComm:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "<\<nu>a><\<nu>b>P \<approx>\<^sup>s <\<nu>b><\<nu>a>P"

lemma matchId:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: pi

  shows "[a\<frown>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s P"

proof (state)
this:
  [a\<frown>a]P \<sim>\<^sup>s P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [a\<frown>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s P

proof (prove)
using this:
  [a\<frown>a]P \<sim>\<^sup>s P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [a\<frown>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s P

proof (state)
this:
  [a\<frown>a]P \<approx>\<^sup>s P

goal:
No subgoals!

goal (1 subgoal):

goal:
